name: Belgium e-Invoicing Forum
goal: The goal of the Belgian e-Invoicing Forum is to reunite all relevant stakeholders and to provide 2 representatives in the European Multistakeholder Forum for e-Invoicing
interests: General and Institutional Affairs, Information Society, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: e-Invoicing / e-Procurement as a whole and more particulerely the B2G e-Invoicing directive / PEPPOL
